type: Swimming Pool and Spa Equipment and Supplies
description: Tender to supply Chemicals for Swimming Pools on an as and when requested basis for 2 years.
full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for Swimming Pool Chemicals

**Procurement Title**

W6898-230652 RISO Swimming Pool Chemicals (Eng) / OCIR Produits chimiques pour Piscines (Fra)

* **Reference Number**
WS4047651329-Doc4104111268
* **Solicitation Number**
WS4047651329
* **Publication Date**
2023-07-18
* **Closing Date**
2023-08-11 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

### Procurement Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites eligible contracting parties to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of Chemicals for Swimming Pools, with the primary requirement for delivery to the 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick. The successful contractor will be awarded a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for a period of 2 years, effective September 1, 2023, to August 31, 2025, with an option to renew.

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RISO)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (UNSPSC: 49241700: Swimming pool and spa equipment and supplies)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Procurement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

### Contact Information

* **Primary Contact**
Lyne Leger, [lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Canada
